title: FS: t206 Lajoie s.c. 350 & Crawford PSA
author: Kzoo

posts.post_title: FS: t206 Lajoie s.c. 350 & Crawford PSA
posts.post_content:
Guys............For sale are these 2 t206 PSA graded cards. Prices include shipping to the US only. Paypal 'gift' or money order preferred. Please PM me or email me at mattpienta at yahoo dot com to reserve. Thanks........Matt

-t206 Nap Lajoie portrait...........Sweet Caporal 350, PSA 3, good centering & color, vertical crease up middle from bottom to bottom of cheek and another vertical crease through 'Lajoie', small scratch above head...........$235 obo.

-t206 Sam Crawford w/bat.........Piedmont back, PSA 4, off center, no creases, good color, slightly fuzzy registration, light right edge wear..........."SOLD".
Guys..............I'm open to reasonable offers before I list these two cards on Ebay. Thanks............Matt
